plot: Alex is nine years old. He watches cartoons, he plays with toy soldiers, he loves his mother. One day a man in black face paint begins to follow her around. What will Alex do?
title: The Plague
plot_es: Alex is nine years old. He watches cartoons, he plays with toy soldiers, he loves his mother. One day a man in black face paint begins to follow her around. What will Alex do?
plot_en: Alex is nine years old. He watches cartoons, he plays with toy soldiers, he loves his mother. One day a man in black face paint begins to follow her around. What will Alex do?
